WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 26 SEP BY
   M/V OCEANIC SIRIUS TOWING 12 12000 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   25-02.75S 042-01.20W, 25-43.82S 042-01.57W,
   25-44.50S 039-53.78W, 25-03.15S 039-53.38W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2786/20.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 27 SEP 20.
